data.eml:eml: A new Brazilian Passiflora leafminer: Spinivalva gaucha, gen. n., sp. n. (Lepidoptera, Gracillariidae, Gracillariinae), the first gracillariid without a sap-feeding instar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brito, Rosangela, Goncalves, Gislene L., Vargas, Hector A., Moreira, Gilson R. P. (2013): A new Brazilian Passiflora leafminer: Spinivalva gaucha, gen. n., sp. n. (Lepidoptera, Gracillariidae, Gracillariinae), the first gracillariid without a sap-feeding instar. ZooKeys 291: 1-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.291.4910, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.291.4910
